thread.title: Jude Anthany apologises for fb post
thread.title_full: Jude Anthany apologises for fb post - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Jude Anthany apologises for fb post
text:
When it comes to getting trolled online, director Jude Anthany takes the cake.
The latest post of the director which has provoked netizens is a review of Aashiq Abu's Rani Padmini, which 'disapppointed him' according to Jude. Following massive backlash, the director has now removed the comment, and posted a second status saying he feels sorry for writing a bad review of a movie right on the day of it's release. "I expected much more, which might be why I was disappointed. I said my view as a layman, not as a director."
